titles: An elegy on the death of Thomas Merry, Esq; of St. Ann's Lane, who died on St. Bartholomew's day, 1682.
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "'TWas night; the Comet in the Welkin glar'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Merry, Thomas, d. 1682 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
